availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Harrodsburg, Kentucky, attorney. Anderson County, Kentucky, native. Son of John B. Bell. Attended Transylvania University. Married to Sallie M. Bell on September 15, 1859. Father of Paul E. Bell, Anna C. Bell, and William C. Bell. Attorney in Harrodsburg in 1863. County surveyor of Mercer County from 1862 to 1866.

ab.bibl:
The Biographical Encyclopædia of Kentucky of the Dead and Living Men of the Nineteenth Century, vol. 1 (Cincinnati: J. M. Armstrong & Company, 1878), 177.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer, Harrodsburg, p. 22.
Find A Grave, “Thomas Clelland Bell (August 29, 1838-February 1, 1901),” Memorial #45692592, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/45692592 (accessed June 5, 2017).
